column1: The '''Tree of Tongues''' is a sketch by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] found in the chapter "[[The Lhammas]]" of ''[[The Lost Road and Other Writings]]''. It shows the relationship between the multitude of languages described in that section of the book. Three similar sketches entitled ''Table of the Descent of Tongues'' are included with the [[Tengwesta Qenderinwa]], some dating later than those in [[The Lhammas]].<ref>{{PE

The later revisions of the [[legendarium]] show a considerably different and a bit simplified history of the languages. For example, we know from ''[[The Silmarillion]]'' that the [[Elvish]] languages do not descend from Valarin, taught to them by [[Oromë]], but from [[Primitive Quendian]], spoken before Oromë found the [[Elves]].
